title: Beautiful duplex apartment by Opera
posting_body: ['Main Feature of this beautiful finished and contemporary unit:', '1 bedroom/1.5 bathroom with two-level floor plan', 'Quiet/bright/big windows with nature light', 'Kitchen and bathrooms are marble finished in European style with many cabinet', 'Refrigerator, oven and washer/dryer included', 'Comfortable bedroom with huge two-side walk-in closet', 'Another closet and a storage room included in the unit', 'Private balcony with a locked storage room and overlooks mission st', 'Very new carpet in bedroom / living room', 'A computer room by the bed room', 'Air Conditioning', 'Non Smoking Buiding /no pets', 'Building Ammenities', 'Very new unit/building', 'Beautifully landscaped garden courtyard to BBQ', '24 hr access to fitness center', 'Basement parking ($250/mon) with additional storage room', 'Two high speed elevators', 'Walking distance to opera house/civic center, to shops and restaurants in SoMa, Hayes Valley, and the Mission.', 'Near MUNI & BART and easy access to HWY 101 & I-280.', 'Available now, prefer 2-year- lease term', 'Contact', 'show contact info', '(Sophia)']
